usernode

Class SystemInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • usernode.SystemInfo

  • public class SystemInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a container of all the information of the system.

      • getUDPPort

        public int getUDPPort(int ID)
        This methods returns an integer containing the UDP port of the regular node with identifier ID. This is the port where the regular nodes wait for the message from the user to become new admin.
        Parameters:
        ID - identifier of the node
        Returns:
        the UDP port of the node with identifier ID
